Subsection.title: Overview
Subsection.Paragraph: The Categories tab allows for grouping captions into categories.

Subsection.title: Creating A Category
Subsection.Paragraph: Click the Add Category button to create a new category.

Subsection.title: Assigned Captions To Categories
Subsection.Paragraph: When a category is selected, the captions that are not assigned to that category will appear in the list of unassigned captions. Conversely, the captions that are assigned to the category will appear in the list of assigned captions. In a similar manner as for image caption assignment, captions can be assigned and unassigned to/from a category using the arrow buttons.

FormalItem.Image: The unassigned captions for the selected category.

FormalItem.title: Category (Assigned Captions)
FormalItem.Image: The assigned captions for the selected category.

Subsection.title: Category Requirement
Subsection.Paragraph: Categories can be marked as required using the buttons above the category list. When a category is required, all images must have at least one caption from that category assigned to pass validation checks.
